text.text: ScummVM is a collection of game engine recreations.

text.name: info4
text.text: Originally designed to play LucasArts adventure games that use

text.name: info5
text.text: the SCUMM system, it also supports a variety of non-SCUMM

text.name: info6
text.text: games by companies like Revolution Software and Adventure Soft.

text.name: info7
text.text: It was originally written by Ludvig Strigeus.
